articles.author: Paul Tassi
articles.title: Loads Of 'Diablo 4: Vessel Of Hatred' Info Revealed, Spiritborn Class, Mercenaries, More - Forbes
articles.description: Blizzard has now taken to a blog, and a future showcase, to reveal a lot more information about Diablo 4: Vessel of Hatred. Here’s what we know:
articles.content:
Diablo 
Blizzard
It was a busy Xbox showcase yesterday, so Blizzard only got a relatively short spot to show off a Diablo 4: Vessel of Haterd cinematic trailer featuring Neyrelle getting corrupted … [+2656 chars]
